## EXISTING STRUCTURES

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities you are trying to connect are compatible and that you are using the correct attributes. For example, when connecting a steam engine to a power pole, ensure you are referencing the correct position and not using an incorrect attribute.

### Errors when the steam engine is not receiving power
- Verify that the steam engine is properly connected to a power network and that it has a sufficient water supply. Check the connections and ensure that there are no breaks in the power lines.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
